Uses of Class
com.stoyanr.mastermind.Score

  • Packages that use Score 
    Package Description
    com.stoyanr.mastermind  

    • Uses of Score in com.stoyanr.mastermind

      Fields in com.stoyanr.mastermind declared as Score 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Score Score.ZERO_SCORE 
      Methods in com.stoyanr.mastermind that return Score 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Score Mastermind.evaluateScore(String guess, String code)
      Evaluates how the passed guess scores against the passed code in the current game setup.
      Score Mastermind.evaluateScoreSafe(String guess, String code)
      Evaluates how the passed guess scores against the passed code in the current game setup.
      Score Player.getScore(String guess)
      Gets the score for the given guess.
      Score DefaultPlayer.getScore(String guess)
      Scores the passed guess correctly against the code passed upon construction, by delegating to Mastermind.evaluateScore(String, String).
      Score AbstractIOPlayer.getScore(String guess)
      First prints a message to the output device to ask the user for a score, and then reads two integer numbers from the input device, first for the "cows" and then for the "bulls".
      Score Mastermind.getWinningScore()
      Returns the winning score for the current game setup, that is a score with 0 cows and length bulls.
      Methods in com.stoyanr.mastermind that return types with arguments of type Score 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Score> Mastermind.getAllPossibleScores()
      Returns a list containing all possible scores (or answers) for the current game setup.
      protected List<Score> AbstractAlgorithm.getAllPossibleScores()
      Returns all possible scores for the current game setup.
      Methods in com.stoyanr.mastermind with parameters of type Score 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected SortedSet<String> AbstractAlgorithm.evaluatePossibleCodes(String guess, Score score)
      Determines all codes from the still possible codes against which the passed guess evaluates as the passed score.
      SortedSet<String> Mastermind.evaluatePossibleCodes(String guess, Score score, SortedSet<String> codes)
      Determines all codes from the passed codes against which the passed guess evaluates as the passed score.
      boolean Mastermind.isValidScore(Score score)
      Determines if the passed score is valid for the current game setup.
      void DumbAlgorithm.putGuessScore(String guess, Score score) 
      void Algorithm.putGuessScore(String guess, Score score)
      Accepts a score for the last guess returned by Algorithm.makeGuess().
      void AbstractAlgorithm.putGuessScore(String guess, Score score)

      Returns the precalculated guess for the specified level and previously produced scores.
